title: Can't connect at all
body: I've been trying to connect all day into league but I keep getting a 'failed to connect to server' error and I can't do anything but sit and keep trying I just wanted to play a couple of games of ranked since I recently got demoted and wanna get back to where I was

replies.body: Do you happen to be on Comcast and are specifically stuck at the login screen? I've been seeing an increasing number of players reporting issues specifically with Comcast and logging in.
